Package it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.persistence

Class TextFileExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.persistence.TextFileExporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExportManager
    public class TextFileExporter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExportManager
    This class implements the interface ExportManager and has the responsibility to export all data of the ledger in .txt files in a given path.
    Author:
    Tommaso Catervi
